Elsa.description: Tom is Elsa's colleague at Orange. They share a professional relationship and often collaborate on projects. Elsa values Tom's dedication and expertise.

John.description: Tom is John's roommate. They share a living space and occasionally engage in activities together. John appreciates Tom's companionship and cooking skills.

James.description: Tom is James's acquaintance. While they don't interact much, Tom respects James's dedication to fitness and occasionally seeks advice from him.

Sara.description: Tom is Sara's colleague at Orange. They have a professional relationship and occasionally collaborate on projects. Tom admires Sara's creativity and dedication.

Alice.description: Tom is Alice's colleague at Orange. They share a professional relationship and often discuss work-related matters. Tom appreciates Alice's skills and contributions to their projects.
